question: 宅
sourceMnemonic: Just like its kanji, this word means <vocabulary>house</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>home</vocabulary>. By extension, it also sometimes means <vocabulary>household</vocabulary>. It can go after someone’s name to say whose house it is, as in <ja>山田宅</ja> (Yamada’s house), and after words that give more information about the house, such as <ja>女性宅</ja> (women’s homes).
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned with the kanji. Go home now.
